# field_name: # this will generate new source files

|comment #: Write protection for RD_DIS_KEY0 RD_DIS_KEY1 RD_DIS_KEY2 RD_DIS_KEY3 RD_DIS_KEY4 RD_DIS_KEY5 RD_DIS_SYS_DATA_PART2
Write protection for DIS_ICACHE DIS_DOWNLOAD_ICACHE DIS_FORCE_DOWNLOAD DIS_USB DIS_CAN SOFT_DIS_JTAG DIS_DOWNLOAD_MANUAL_ENCRYPT

Write protection for FLASH_TPUW DIS_DOWNLOAD_MODE DIS_DIRECT_BOOT DIS_USB_SERIAL_JTAG_ROM_PRINT DIS_TINY_BASIC DIS_USB_SERIAL_JTAG_DOWNLOAD_MODE ENABLE_SECURITY_DOWNLOAD UART_PRINT_CONTROL PIN_POWER_SELECTION FLASH_TYPE FORCE_SEND_RESUME SECURE_VERSION
Disable force chip go to download mode function
Set this bit to enable selection between usb_to_jtag and pad_to_jtag through strapping gpio10 when both reg_dis_usb_jtag and reg_dis_pad_jtag are equal to 0.
Set these bits to disable JTAG in the soft way (odd number 1 means disable). JTAG can be enabled in HMAC module.
Disable JTAG in the hard way. JTAG is disabled permanently.
Disable flash encryption when in download boot modes.
Controls single-end input threshold vrefh 1.76 V to 2 V with step of 80 mV stored in eFuse.
Controls single-end input threshold vrefl 0.8 V to 1.04 V with step of 80 mV stored in eFuse.
Set this bit to vdd spi pin function as gpio
Set this bit to enable power glitch function
Sample delay configuration of power glitch
Select RTC WDT time out threshold
SPI boot encrypt decrypt enable. odd number 1 enable. even number 1 disable
Enable revoke first secure boot key
Enable revoke second secure boot key
Enable revoke third secure boot key
Flash wait time after power up. (unit is ms). When value is 15. the time is 30 ms
Disble download mode include boot_mode[3:0] is 0 1 2 3 6 7
Disable usb serial jtag print during rom boot
b00:force print. b01:control by GPIO8 - low level print. b10:control by GPIO8 - high level print. b11:force disable print.
Force ROM code to send a resume command during SPI boot
Use BLOCK0 to check error record registers
Disables check of wafer version major
Disables check of blk version major

# field_name: # WAFER_VERSION_MINOR most significant bit is from RD_MAC_SPI_SYS_5
